original_text: When the chief baker saw that the interpretation was favorable, he said to Joseph, “I also had a dream: there were three cake baskets on my head,
korean_text: 떡 굽는 관원장이 그 해석이 좋은 것을 보고 요셉에게 이르되 나도 꿈에 보니 흰 떡 세 광주리가 내 머리에 있고

sentences.original_text: When the chief baker saw that the interpretation was favorable
sentences.korean_translation: 수석 떡 굽는 자는 해몽이 좋은 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: there were three cake baskets on my head
sentences.korean_translation: 내 머리에 떡 광주리 세 개가 있더라
